title: AP Exclusive: 1st fed inmate tests positive for coronavirus
description: An inmate at a federal jail in New York City has tested positive for coronavirus, marking the first confirmed case in the federal prison system
content:
WASHINGTON -- 
An inmate at a federal jail in New York City has tested positive for coronavirus, marking the first confirmed case in the federal prison system.
